articles.description: IPL 2022: Arjun Tendulkar bowled a brilliant yorker and it ended up castling Mumbai Indians teammate during a training session.
articles.content: Arjun Tendulkar is yet to play a game for the Mumbai Indians in the ongoing Indian Premier League (IPL) 2022 edition but he has already garnered a lot of attention and the fans are desperately waitin… [+1120 chars]
